message: I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $9000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you is $8000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. Would you be willing to consider a price of $7500?
I understand you're looking to save money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8500. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $7200?

I'm not willing to go as low as $7200. I'm willing to make one more concession at $8000, which is the minimum price I'm willing to accept. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider selling to John.
